trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around March 1st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was just done delivering and I lean forward to change sirius radio station and I see a black triangle with three dull whitelights hovering above the hood of the vehicle while I was driving and it went straight up at my cruising speed and it was about 50 feet long on 3 sides. I never lost satellite radio reception and the antenna was on my dash. I should've lost radio reception seconds after it appeared. The fact I still had reception may be a clue to more about it.
Summary: triangle hovered over my truck as I drove
